Package com.objetdirect.tatami.client.charting

Interface Summary
HasTooltip This interface describes object which can be added to series and may have a tooltip
 

Class Summary
Axis This class represents an axis to draw on a chart
AxisLabel Represents an Axis label A label has a text, and the value to which it is attached
BarPlot<T extends Number> A Plot for various bars and columns chart types
Bubble A data object to fill series for a bubble plot.
BubblePlot A plot type for bubble type charts.
Chart2D This class wraps a dojo chart2D
Legend This widget automatically creates a legend for a given chart.
PiePiece A data object used to represent pie pieces in a pie plot
PiePlot<T>  
Plot<T> Generic class used for various plot types
Plot2D<T> A plot for displaying Bi-dimensional values, either as lines, areas, markers or any combination of these
Point A point object, designed to be used with Plot2D
Serie<T> A serie represents data to be plotted on the chart, along with representation options
Themes This class contains all the constants corresponding to the dojo themes
